sourcesContent:
"I am not a language that you can learn, But I am what makes your computer turn."

"I consist of symbols and keys, Without me, your device would seize."

"I'm made up of 1s and 0s, I run the show, that's just how it goes."

" So tell me, what am I called? The answer is simple, if you're not stalled."

" The solution is easy, it's not obscene. I'm the backbone of the digital world,"

"Can you guess my name, have you unfurled?"
